feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [SBG1][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 25, 02:00 UTC  -  Oct 26, 05:00 UTC

Oct 17, 05:55 UTC

End time : 26/10/2023 05:00 UTC

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - R802R20/R802R21
entry.content:
Oct 11, 16:59 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 11/10/2023 10:04 UTC
End time : 11/10/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in racks R802R20 and R802R21 were unreachable.
Root cause : Disjunction due to cooling module system failure.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 11, 15:56 UTC
Identified - Start time : 11/10/2023 10:04 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in racks R802R20 and R802R21 are currently unreachable.
Root cause : Disjunction due to cooling module system failure.
Related incident : Incident link
Ongoing actions : Our teams are still working to solve the problem of the few remaining impacted servers in rack R802R20 and R802R21.
Updates will be posted as significant progress is made

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - R806R16 - R806R17
entry.content:
Sep 27, 16:14 UTC
Resolved - Start time: 27/09/2023 11:13 UTC
End time: 27/09/2023 16:08 UTC
User impact :All the servers on these racks are operational again.
Services are working as they should be.
Root cause:It was due to malfunction on a power supply

Sep 27, 12:53 UTC

Sep 27, 11:54 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 27/09/2023 11:13 UTC

Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.content:
Sep 25, 03:45 UTC

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX

Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [Global][VMwarePrivateCloud] â€“ NSX , vCenter, Zerto & ESXi major upgrade
entry.content:
Sep 22, 17:18 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Aug 2, 14:27 UTC
Update - The maintenance has a new end time :
New end time : 31/08/2023 16:00 UTC

Jun 12, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 9, 17:17 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 12/06/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 31/08/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : During NSX upgrade , Hosts will be put in maintenance mode and reboot
During vSphere and Zerto migrations , management will be inaccessible for 3 hours.
During ESXi migrations , In some case Binaries will be pushed locally or Hosts will be rebooted, (no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers with and without Zerto service
